apple_vendor_description: This tender kiss emoji on Apple devices depicts a man with a medium-dark skin tone leaning in to kiss a woman whose skin tone is depicted in a neutral, universally recognizable shade, reflecting Apple's commitment to diverse representation. Their faces are rendered with soft, rounded edges and gentle facial expressions, conveying affection and intimacy through subtle shading and realistic lighting. On Apple devices, this emoji is a beautiful way to express romantic love, deep affection, or a heartfelt connection between two people.
